Title: How Cloudflare is staying ahead of the AMD Zen vulnerability known as “Zenbleed”
Description: Zenbleed, tracked as CVE-2023-20593, is a flaw in the software that allows for the theft of data at a rate of 30kb per core, per second. This is more than fast enough to intercept private data as it passes through the processor

Title: Google’s nightmare “Web Integrity API” wants a DRM gatekeeper for the web
Description: It's just a "proposal," but it's also being prototyped inside Chrome right now.
